function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential airborne transmission of TB in the exposure chambers","Impact":"Increased risk of TB infection in animals and potential spread to humans","Mitigation":"Use of specialized air filtration systems and regular testing for TB in the chambers","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UV-C germicidal lamps, ionization air purifiers","People":"Animal handlers, laboratory workers, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institution"},{"Description":"Proximity of TB-infected animals in exposure chambers","Impact":"Heightened risk of TB transmission between animals","Mitigation":"Separation of TB-infected animals, regular testing, and infection control measures","Technologies":"Isolation chambers, ventilation systems, disinfection protocols","People":"Animal handlers, laboratory workers, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institution"},{"Description":"Contamination of the environment with TB particulates","Impact":"Increase in risk of exposure to TB for animals and humans","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of the built environment, use of UVGI disinfection systems","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI), HEPA filters, ionization air purifiers","People":"Animal handlers, laboratory workers, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institution"}]}
